name: Thunderhelm Lawachurl
desc:
A mysterious "lord" of hilichurls that strides through the thunderstorm.
This huge hilichurl is referred to as "Lawa" by its brethren. Its giant body is so saturated with Electro energy that Elemental Energy seeps through the cracks in its body in the form of Electro Crystal growths.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Heavy Horn
dropMaterial.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

dropMaterial.name: Black Bronze Horn
dropMaterial.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

dropMaterial.name: Black Crystal Horn
dropMaterial.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

dropMaterial.name: Damaged Mask
dropMaterial.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

dropMaterial.name: Stained Mask
dropMaterial.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

dropMaterial.name: Ominous Mask
dropMaterial.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Did My Hand Fall From My Wrist?</color>
Defeat a Thunderhelm Lawachurl while in an enhanced state.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
